author: Simon Difford
description: Often made with up to four times as much bitter liqueur but in such high doses this dominates the other ingredients. Hence in December 2020, thanks to a comment below, we made our recipe more restrained to allow the passion fruit to shine while delivering a relatively dry cocktail.
name: Monza
